subject: Star Crossed Lovers
text:
What tangled webs we weave of lies and deception.
When it starts as friends and turning into star crossed lovers.
The truth only to be sought in true loves embrace. 
Defying all odds and searching out others trying to forget what is demand of us, and realizing that true happiness is in the arms of the other. 
Defying all odds and rushing into the embrace not caring what comes in the future only living for that moment in time. 
Lovers are met and lost but true love never dominates it flourishes with your one true love.
